title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in the shade Putty Matte. This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick is perfect for achieving a matte finish with a light taupe-pink color. 

The Julep Eyeshadow 101 comes in three different finishes: Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic. With its crème-to-powder formula, it glides on smoothly and effortlessly. Plus, it is waterproof and crease-proof, ensuring long-lasting wear throughout the day.

Formulated with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only enhances your beauty but also nourishes and protects your delicate sensitive skin. It offers antioxidant protection and improves skin tone and texture.

The best part? No application tool is required! This eyeshadow stick features a built-in smudger, making it easy to blend and create the perfect look. Simply coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, and use the smudger or your fingers to blend. Make sure to blend before the formula sets for a flawless finish.

Upgrade your eyeshadow game with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in the shade Putty Matte. Try it now and experience the convenience and beauty it offers.

Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in the shade Putty Matte. This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick offers a matte finish in a beautiful light taupe-pink color. 

With its crème-to-powder formula, this eyeshadow stick glides effortlessly onto the eyelids, providing a waterproof and crease-proof application. The Julep Eyeshadow 101 is suitable for delicate sensitive skin, making it a perfect choice for all skin types. 

Enriched with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only adds vibrant color to your eyes but also provides antioxidant protection. It even helps improve skin tone and texture, leaving your eyelids looking flawless.

No need for any additional application tools, as this eyeshadow stick comes with a built-in smudger for easy blending. To achieve the desired look, simply coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, and use the smudger or your fingers to blend. Remember to blend before the formula sets for a seamless finish.

Upgrade your eyeshadow game with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick. Try it in other shades such as Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic for endless eye makeup possibilities.

Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick is perfect for creating stunning eye looks. With its light taupe-pink color and matte finish, it adds a touch of elegance to any makeup style.

The Julep Eyeshadow 101 comes in three different shades: Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic, giving you plenty of options to choose from. Its crème-to-powder formula ensures easy application and a smooth, long-lasting finish. Plus, it is waterproof and crease-proof, making it ideal for all-day wear.

Formulated with beneficial ingredients such as Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only provides beautiful color but also nourishes and protects your delicate skin. It is suitable for even the most sensitive skin types.

Experience the added convenience of this eyeshadow stick, as it does not require an application tool. It features a built-in smudger, allowing you to effortlessly blend and create a seamless eye look. The application instructions are simple: coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, and use the smudger or your fingers to blend. For best results, remember to blend before the formula sets.

Don't miss out on the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte. Enhance your natural beauty with this versatile and easy-to-use eyeshadow stick.

Experience the convenience and quality of the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte. Enhance your natural beauty effortlessly and confidently with this long-lasting and versatile eyeshadow stick.
